post.body: - can we agree that 2009 is about GTD and not the fashion BS that has dominated the 2008 SV 'noise?'
- disagree as much as you like but the HP mini notebook was fab. And failed. This obsession is another SV fashion statement.
- heh - if Christmas is a time when you can't make time for your family etc then you are seriously fskd - IMO. Arrington aside.
- you mean they're too lazy to cook for themselves and families? I can't believe that. Even in SF.
- if I need to explain then I also need take you out the back and smack your face. @maggiefox told me how.
RT @guhmshoo: @dahowlett Maybe they really aren't that smart. +1 << you only just figured that?? Fine.
RT @pauloflaherty: Got lots of great presents today.. but the best by far was time with @subrbanoblivion :) ++2: same here with Jude
There are so many smart people around but how many bother to check history and see if what is said today is repeated? Apparently very few.
This BS re:the mini notebook is possibly the BS nonsense of 2008 par exellence. Go waste your money but it's been done before with HP.
Cooking for family is something wonderful. My son cooked for 4 grandchildren, Italian style. Makes me proud. Yay Joe!!
reading back. @tebbo only sees me grumpy. Pity.
RT @PhilBaumann: Thank God for Jesus Juice. Jesus Juice Saves! +1. Phil is taking the michael but that's OK
RT @Roebot: @dahowlett btw, wouldn't it be grt if twitter had a KarmaBot +1 ++1: PERFECTO
Loving @IACEZ 's avatar
RT @joshholat: I love Chinese people! They keep their restaurants open on Christmas :-) -1: << that's just greedy.
Sad to say Jude lost the Wii tennis plot. I think it is time to retire...a la manana todos! (I don't have a Spanish keyboard)
RT @Roebot: @dahowlett lol me house will break tho... :-( +1 LMWAO
PRT @MikeMcDerment: family passing fortune telling fish - the one from the xmas cracker. - <<for that you need reality U need 2 C Benders
RT @davewiner: This is the gadget I ended up getting. http://bit.ly/eGmA << that's what I call sad.
RT @alexdc: "So you think you can tell / Blue skies from Hell ..." -Pink Floyd +1
